name: CourseModules
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for creating new module record

Request payload must contain the following fields:

course_id: STRING,
description: STRING

Request:

POST - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/courseModules

raw 
  {
    "course_id": "",
    "title":"CONCLUSION",
    "description": "a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease and infirmity"
}

Response:

400 - Bad Request 

  {"status":400,"status_type":"error","message":"Bad Request","count":1,"errors":["ID is required, it should not be empty."]}
statusMessage: Status code is 200, Verify success message
